roleset.name: burial ceremony
roleset.note: FUNERAL-N NOTES: Based on ontonouns. Slight comparison with ceremony.01. Framed by Katie. (from funeral.01-n)

example.name: arg 0
example.text: He could not have a church funeral

example.name: ARG1
example.text: At his funeral on Christmas Eve, the ministers were eloquent and personal in their eulogies.
